title: Complexity of Gibbs samplers through Bayesian asymptotics. (arXiv:2304.06993v1 [stat.CO])
abstract: Gibbs samplers are popular algorithms to approximate posterior distributions arising from Bayesian hierarchical models. Despite their popularity and good empirical performances, however, there are still relatively few quantitative theoretical results on their scalability or lack thereof, e.g. much less than for gradient-based sampling methods. We introduce a novel technique to analyse the asymptotic behaviour of mixing times of Gibbs Samplers, based on tools of Bayesian asymptotics. We apply our methodology to high dimensional hierarchical models, obtaining dimension-free convergence results for Gibbs samplers under random data-generating assumptions, for a broad class of two-level models with generic likelihood function. Specific examples with Gaussian, binomial and categorical likelihoods are discussed.

translated_title: 基于贝叶斯渐近性的Gibbs抽样器复杂性
translated_abstract: Gibbs抽样器是用于近似来自贝叶斯分层模型的后验分布的流行算法。尽管它们非常流行且表现良好，但是关于它们的可扩展性或不可扩展性的定量理论结果相对较少，例如，比基于梯度的抽样方法要少得多。本文介绍了一种基于贝叶斯渐近性工具的新技术，用于分析Gibbs抽样器的混合时间的渐近行为。我们将我们的方法应用于高维分层模型，并在随机数据生成假设下获得了对于具有通用似然函数的广泛的二级模型的无维度收敛结果。讨论了具有高斯、二项式和分类似然的具体示例。
tldr: 本文介绍了一种基于贝叶斯渐近性工具的方法，用于分析Gibbs抽样器的混合时间的渐近行为，并在随机数据生成假设下获得了对于具有通用似然函数的广泛的二级模型的无维度收敛结果。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces a novel technique based on Bayesian asymptotics to analyze the asymptotic behavior of mixing times of Gibbs samplers, and obtains dimension-free convergence results for a broad class of two-level models with generic likelihood function under random data-generating assumptions.
